extendedInfo.description: Nice Unicorn  is a Live Wallpaper.After you have downloaded and installed it,  You need in order to set it  as a Live Wallpaper:- go to your home screen;- press the menu button on your device;- select "Wallpaper";- select "Live Wallpapers";- search and select for this Live Wallpaper"- select "Settings" to see the settings or select "Set wallpaper" to activate it.System Requirement:any phone that came with Android OS 2.0 or later should work fine. Anything that came with 1.5 / 1.6 may have problemsTags:Nice Unicorn  Live wallpapers Sky Blue Nature trees green colours

reviews.title: Not vey good
reviews.comment: All the live wallpaper unicorn apps have like snow or something moving not an actual unicorn moving.
reviews.author: A Google User
